body:
As everyone knows, there is an English translator, Arrigen. But I don't know what does 'translating English to English' mean.
Can someone explain me please :)
body_tagged:
As everyone knows, there is an English translator, Arrigen. But I don't know what does 'translating English to English' mean.
Can someone explain me please :)
title: English Translator?

replies.body: I don't see a point of having an English translator...
replies.body_tagged: I don't see a point of having an English translator...

replies.body: Don't quote me on this but I'm pretty sure he is just on the team to manage it and make sure everything is going smoothly.
replies.body_tagged: Don't quote me on this but I'm pretty sure he is just on the team to manage it and make sure everything is going smoothly.

replies.body:
Might be:) But he could give himself a rank called 'Manager Translater'.
I think that it would be better than 'English Translater'
replies.body_tagged:

Under the name English translator? LOL

replies.body: I manage the team, he just supports me. He doesn't translate english, but he knows some french.
replies.body_tagged: I manage the team, he just supports me. He doesn't translate english, but he knows some french.

replies.body:
I always thought it was to fix grammatical, punctuation and spelling mistakes.
It's probably Hoops because if you left that up to Sessp then the whole Translation project would be fucked xD
